focused on three key things the first of those is data center sovereignty our
data centers need to be on Australian soil that was okay the second one was we
needed to take protected data off the table we don't necessarily agree that it
should be off the table for a long period of time but we were happy to take it off the table if it allowed us to

would meet what they thought it needed to be but we gave them two challenges the first thing we said was it needs to
